byline.original: By JASON TURBOW and JUDY BATTISTA

abstract: NFL Roundup; Oakland Raiders quarterback Carson Palmer is busy preparing with team for upcoming game against Kansas City Chiefs; other football items noted.
snippet: The Carson Palmer era in Oakland was just hours old when the speculation began as to how soon the quarterback would make his first appearance in silver and black.
lead_paragraph: The Carson Palmer era in Oakland was just hours old when the speculation began as to how soon the quarterback would make his first appearance in silver and black.

headline.main: Hurry-Up Offense: Palmer Gets Going With Raiders
headline.print_headline: Hurry-Up Offense: Ready or Not, Palmer Gets Going With the Raiders
headline.seo: Carson Palmer Gets Going With Raiders
